com.intellij.util.xmlb.annotations

Annotation Type XCollection


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface XCollection

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String elementName
      Value of primitive type wrapped into element named option.
      java.lang.Class<?>[] elementTypes 
      java.lang.String propertyElementName
      The property element name.
      XCollection.Style style 
      java.lang.String valueAttributeName
      Value of primitive type wrapped into element named `option`.

    • Element Detail

      • propertyElementName

        public abstract java.lang.String propertyElementName
        The property element name. Defaults to property name if style() is set to XCollection.Style.v2. If not specified and style() is not specified - property serialized using option tag.
        Default:
        ""

      • elementName

        public abstract java.lang.String elementName
        Value of primitive type wrapped into element named option. This option allows you to customize element name.
        Default:
        "option"

      • valueAttributeName

        public abstract java.lang.String valueAttributeName
        Value of primitive type wrapped into element named `option`. This option allows you to customize name of value attribute.
        Default:
        "value"

      • elementTypes

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?>[] elementTypes
        Default:
        {}

      • style

        public abstract XCollection.Style style
        Default:
        com.intellij.util.xmlb.annotations.XCollection.Style.v1
